sourcesContent:
// Libraries import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import classNames from 'classnames' // Components import { formatCurrency, prettyDate } from 'utils' import { STATEMENT_TYPES } from 'shared/catalogs' class taxStatementDetails extends Component { // Render diot content renderDiot ({ url, diot_presented_on: presentedON }) { return (

DIOT

Descargar DIOT

Fecha de presentación

{presentedON ? prettyDate(presentedON) : '---'}

) } render () { const { taxStatementDetails, statusExpiration } = this.props const { folio, capture_line: captureLine, presented_on: presentedON, payment_due_date: dueDate, amount, url, diot } = taxStatementDetails const statementType = STATEMENT_TYPES.find( type => taxStatementDetails.statement_type === type.id ).label const [startDate] = taxStatementDetails.period const year = moment(startDate).format('YYYY') const month = moment(startDate).format('MMMM') return (

Ejercicio

{year}

Mes de trabajo

{month}

Fecha de presentación

{prettyDate(presentedON, null, true, false, '-') || '---'}

Tipo de declaración

{statementType}

Folio

{folio || '---'}

Línea de captura

{captureLine || 'No aplica'} {statusExpiration && captureLine !== 'No aplica' && 'Vencida'}

Fecha límite de pago

{captureLine === 'No aplica' ? '---' : prettyDate(dueDate, null, true, false, '-') || '---'}

Descargar acuse

{formatCurrency(amount)} Total por pagar

{diot.diot_presented_on && this.renderDiot(diot)}
) } } export default taxStatementDetails
